channel.title: Poems on Pranshu Gaba
channel.description: Recent content in Poems on Pranshu Gaba
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

item.title: torrent
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
torrential downpour, strong gales
  unabated for days and days
cool respite from the scorching heat
  a harbinger of climate change

item.title: McSwirl
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
vanilla McSwirl
thrown out of a moving car —
even crows didn’t eat it

item.title: debris
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
among debris
beside the covered statue —
news is read

item.title: masks
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
a pandemic so severe
everyone wears masks —
even mannequins

item.title: ocean
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
an ocean of knowledge
and adventures galore—
sold by weight

item.title: ambulance
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
rush hour traffic
lights blinking red and blue —
an ambulance whizzes by

item.title: crossing
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
look left and right
before crossing the road —
and railway tracks

item.title: spider
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
bright blue dots
glowing in the dark —
radioactive spider

item.title: liquefy
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
a late afternoon —
     chocolate and vanilla
        cool delicious chocobar

but lo and behold —
     misfortune befalls
        the ice-cream falls

liquefied dessert —
     will now be eaten
        by a simian

item.title: sofa
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
covered in cardboard
a sofa waiting outside —
it’s about to rain

item.title: equines
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
two donkeys munch grass
on a cloudy sunny day —
outside a book fair

item.title: lightning
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
scrawled in the sky
in the middle of the night,
brighter than daytime
a sudden flash of lightning –
thunder follows soon after

item.title: tributaries
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
a river and its
tributaries aren’t unlike
trees and their branches

item.title: beads
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
cold rainy morning —
beads of glass hang like an
ornate chandelier

item.title: vines
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
in the rainy months,
the railway crossing sign dons
a coat of green vines

item.title: pink
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
a blossom of pink
dainty carpet on the ground
yet swept off the road

item.title: fire
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
fire burning bright —
leaving nothing behind but
dim amber embers

item.title: flames
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
orange flames above —
providing cool respite from
the sweltering sun

item.title: Two Monkeys on a Bicycle
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
Two monkeys sat on a bicycle,
neither knew how to ride the cycle.
    They tried out a stunt
    but they really stunk,
’cause they could only ride a unicycle.

item.title: streaks
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
blazing streaks of light —
drawing beautiful patterns
with long exposure

item.title: The Shopping Trolley in the Hall
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
There lay a shopping trolley in the hall,
so far away from the shopping mall.
    It was utterly lost,
    its path uncrossed
with no one there to look at it at all.

item.title: grey water
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
a new day begins —
above the grey water grows
a flower rainbow

item.title: mirror world
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
in the mirror world —
contrariwise, the sun sets
in the eastern sky

item.title: beyond
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
summer afternoon —
do you know what lies beyond?
white green blue and brown

item.title: The Cat Named Toad
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
There once was a cat named Toad,
Who loved to take naps on the road.
    He was very displeased,
    When woken from sleep,
Yet he decided to let it go.

item.title: purple
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
purple twilight
branches reach for the sky —
infinite fractals

item.title: spring
item.author: pranshu@pranshugaba.com (Pranshu Gaba)
item.description:
spring begins —
honeybees gather nectar
from vibrant flowers
